content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-101-04-A
|Item_parent=Facial paralysis
|Item_parent_short=Facial paralysis
|Rank=A
|Title=Photograph/video of central facial paralysis
|Description=None
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=4}}
Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.title: What is the primary purpose of the CEN website?
question.description: The CEN website provides videos of facial paralysis for educational purposes.

option_a.title: Facial paralysis research
option_a.description: The CEN website is primarily used for research purposes.

option_b.title: Facial paralysis education
option_b.description: The CEN website is used to educate the public about facial paralysis.

option_c.title: Facial paralysis treatment
option_c.description: The CEN website does not provide information on facial paralysis treatment.

option_d.title: Facial paralysis awareness
option_d.description: The CEN website aims to raise awareness about facial paralysis.

correct_option.title: option_b
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
